name: creed
description: Forward-looking async toolkit: promises, iterators, generators, streaming

scripts.build: babel -d lib src && webpack --output-library creed --output-library-target umd ./lib/Promise.js --output-file dist/creed.js && uglifyjs dist/creed.js -c -m --source-map=dist/creed.min.js.map --source-map-url=creed.min.js.map --source-map-include-sources -o dist/creed.min.js
scripts.test: jscs -x src && npm run build && promises-aplus-tests test/aplus.js

author: brian@hovercraftstudios.com
